SELECT product_code, product_name, unit_no FROM product
AND product_code LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND product_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

select Distinct c.company_code, c.company_name from company c join (select p.product_code, o.company_code from product p join orders o on (p.product_code = o.product_code)) a on c.company_code = a.company_code where a.product_code = #{productCode}

select p.process_name, a.* from process p join ( select b.*,m.material_name from bom b join material m on (b.material_code = m.material_code)) a on (p.process_code=a.process_code) where a.product_code=#{productCode}
